America we can honor the golden rule and treat each other the way we want to be treated and help thy neighbor! Love one another and one by one we can make this nation a better place! The Church of God shall be; One Body , One Mind , One Spirit , One Faith , One Love <ed> <ed> The Temple of God is Established on Three Foundations Faith, Hope, and Love. Salvation is by grace through Faith. Faith involves knowledge of the gospel. Grace exists in four ways; it is earthborn, it is heavenly; it comes from the highest heaven; and it resides in truth. There are 3 classes of righteousness Love , Petition , Reverence There are three kinds of reverence of heaven. They are reverence of the Lord, reverence of Shaddai, and reverence of Elohim. The Foundation of Christianity is Christ. The Lord Greatness Is Unsearchable. The Lord Understanding Is infinite. Lust, the root and beginning of every sin. The Doctrines of the Lord, are Three: the Hope of life, the Beginning and the Completion of it. There are ¡°Three Witnesses¡± to God¡¯s will: *Canonized scriptures . *Prophets and apostles. *Personal revelation . The first principles of the Gospel, Are faith, repentance, and baptism for the remission of sins, and the gift of the Holy Ghost that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in His name among all nations, Focus on two characteristics of God: the fact that he is a God of justice and judgment, but also a God of mercy, hope and grace. He is a God who delivers his people from the hopelessness of moral failure. The word¡¯s first condition is Faith; the second is Love; the third is Works. Now from these comes life. The Four Elements of God are Faith, Hope, Love, and Knowledge. Faith is our earth, that in which we take root.And hope is the water through which we are nourished.Love is the wind through which humility grow.Knowledge is the light through which we ripen. The Lord established five great sacraments or mysteries: """"a baptism and a chrism, and a eucharist, and a redemption, and a bridal chamber."""" The Infinite began creation by engraving the divine names through the 32 paths of Wisdom. The Lord Created the Universe with Three Books ( Sepharim ) with Text ( Sepher ) With Numbers ( Sephar ) and with Communication ( Sippur ) .. With Wisdom God Established the Earth ,With Understanding he established the Heavens, and with Knowledge the Depths Were broken Up. Truth ; is the mouth of the Father. His tongue is the Holy Spirit, who joins him to truth Truth is the Word of God , The Word of God is Knowledge , Knowledge is Understanding , Understanding Gives you The Truth that threw Christ you will be Saved that his death is life for many. the Word of Christ is The Truth the Truth came from him that he and the Father are as One and there Word is the Truth.and his way is the truth which he taught them. the Truth is God Created All Things. Self-knowledge is knowledge of God; the self and the divine are identical.
